reviews.author: Sarah M.
reviews.content: Blue Lawns transformed our backyard into a summer oasis. The team was professional, punctual, and the design exceeded our expectations.

reviews.author: James P.
reviews.content: Best lawn service on the island. They show up on time and my grass has never looked greener.

reviews.author: Emily R.
reviews.content: Excellent fall cleanup service. They removed every leaf and prepped our beds perfectly for winter.

ui_component_spec.className: review-card bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow-sm border border-primary-50
